definition: نقيض naqīḍ opposed, opposite, contrary, antithetical, contradictory; antithesis, opposition, contrast, opposite │ على نقيض contrary to, in opposition to, in contradistinction to, unlike; على النقيض on the 992 contrary; انتقل من النقيض الى نقيضه (intaqala) to go from one extreme to the other, move in extremes
